Dec. 4, 1971 D Edinburgh Charities Contest

edinburgh-charities-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Usher Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Best section 2 band - Newtongrange Lothian. Best section 3 band - Greenock District. Best section 4 band - Selkirk Silver. Best basses - Kinneil. Best instrumentalist - A.Hutchinson(cornet) Dalmellington.
April 24, 2013, 1:38 p.m. April 24, 2013, 1:47 p.m.

2 Broxburn Public Band Frank Renton
